Hi ChattChitto,

 Loveall your uploadsasthere usually all very precise and "do exactly what they say on the tin"!!.
Except for thisone. I'm running Win7 64bit and using both the automated cracking 64bit option and the Automated cracking 2 fail to install correctly. What's happening is the crack is being put into the Driver Soft folder but not into the Driver Genius folder.
Manually applying thecrack works perfectly. I just thought i'd bring this glitch to your attention as others less familiar with the whole "crack" process may misinterprite it as a bad upload.
Keep up the 'smokin' uploads. Love your work!1

It seems that since their last update (.820 on 11/21), nothing will get this to work.  I've uninstalled/reinstalled using the automatic cracks and it still wants a license key.  I uninstalled/reinstalled, let it update, and THEN used the auto cracks, and it still wants the license key.  I uninstalled/reinstalled, let it update, and MANUALLY applied crack, and it still wants license key.  I uninstalled/reinstalled, dug around the Bay for license keys, found a few, used them all, still wants license key.  I was loving this program until it stopped working.  Any suggestions would be great.

heres the trick:
1. download this torrent 
2. install & Update
3. copy drivers.dat (the driver database to your desktop)
4. reinstall DGP and dont update
5. just paste the crack and the updated drivers.dat file that you copied in step-3
